sql.if: and (select B.sens_tp_nm from tb_sensor_type B where B.senstype_no = MG.senstype_no) LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' OR MG.sens_no LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' OR (select B.logr_nm from tb_logger_info B where B.logr_no = MG.logr_no) LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' OR (select B.code_nm from tb_common_code B where B.code_id = MG.maint_sts_cd) LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'

mapper.select: SELECT MG.* FROM ( SELECT A.sens_no , A.logr_no , (SELECT B.sens_tp_nm FROM tb_sensor_type B WHERE B.senstype_no = A.senstype_no) AS senstype_nm , (SELECT B.logr_nm FROM tb_logger_info B WHERE B.logr_no = A.logr_no) AS logr_nm , (SELECT B.code_nm FROM tb_common_code B WHERE B.code_id = A.maint_sts_cd) AS maint_sts_nm , A.senstype_no , A.sens_nm , A.inst_ymd , A.sect_no , A.multi_sens_yn , A.disp_prior_yn , A.multi_senstype_no , A.multi_sens_no , A.nonrecv_limit_min , A.alarm_use_yn , A.sms_snd_yn , A.sens_disp_yn , A.maint_sts_cd , A.sens_lon , A.sens_lat , A.sens_maker , A.model_nm FROM tb_sensor_info A ) MG WHERE 1=1
